DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman Male participant : Will sterile ( include vasectomy ) , confirm documentation . Men sexually active pregnant partner agree use condom 91 day time dose Female participant : Women childbearing potential due surgical sterilization ( least 6 month hysterectomy without bilateral oophorectomy least 6 month tubal ligation ) confirm medical history menopause . Postmenopausal woman include woman spontaneous amenorrhea least 12 month , induce medical condition anorexia nervosa take medication amenorrhea induce amenorrhea ( eg , oral contraceptive , hormone , gonadotropin release hormone , antiestrogens , selective estrogen receptor modulators , chemotherapy ) folliclestimulating hormone level great 40 milli international unit per milliliter ( mIU/mL ) Have body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 32.0 kilogram per meter square ( kg/m² ) Have clinical laboratory test result within normal reference range population investigator site Have venous access sufficient allow blood sample Have participate [ ¹⁴C ] study within last 6 month prior admission study . The total 12month exposure study maximum one previous [ ¹⁴C ] study within 6 12 month study must within Code Federal Regulations ( CFR ) recommend level consider safe : Less 5000 millirem ( mrem ) /year whole body exposure . Exposure significant diagnostic , therapeutic , employmentrelated radiation within 12 month prior dose ( eg , serial xray compute tomography scan , barium meal , current employment job require radiation exposure monitoring ) Are participant previously complete withdrawn study study investigate LY3023414 , previously receive investigational product Have know allergy LY3023414 , related compound , component formulation Regularly use know drug abuse and/or show positive finding urinary drug test Show evidence human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection and/or positive human HIV antibody Show evidence hepatitis C and/or positive hepatitis C antibody Show evidence hepatitis B and/or positive hepatitis B surface antigen Intend use overthecounter prescription medication within 7 day prior dose Have donate blood 500 milliliter ( mL ) within last month Have average weekly alcohol intake exceed 21 unit per week , unwilling stop alcohol consumption 48 hour prior admission resident Clinical Research Unit ( CRU ) Have consume herbal supplement , grapefruit grapefruitcontaining product , Seville oranges Seville orangecontaining product , star fruit star fruitcontaining product within 7 day prior dose intend consume study Are unwilling refrain consume xanthinecontaining food drink 48 hour prior admission discharge CRU Have defecation pattern less per day acute constipation within 3 week prior admission Have history clinically significant adverse drug reaction `` drug allergy '' 3 type systemically administer medication
